暏暏暏

暏字的基本解释

暏
shǔ
古同“曙”，天亮。

暏
dǔ
明；显露：“珠玉不暏乎外，则王公不以为宝。”

暏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǔ］
［《廣韻》當古切，上姥，端。］
(1)天亮。
(2)引申为显露。
(3)明白，懂。参见“暏是”。

暏字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暏； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页498第11
【唐韻】當古切【集韻】【正韻】董五切，?音睹。【說文】旦明也。　又【集韻】常恕切，音署。曙或省作暏。

暏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
暏字的起名意思

暂无。

暏
Basic explanation of words
暏
shǔ
Gu Tong "Dawn", dawn.
暏
dǔ
Ming; reveals: "If the jewel is not dazzling, the prince does not regard it as a treasure."
暏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǔ］
["Guangyun" when ancient cut, grandma, end. ]
(1) Daybreak.
(2) The extension is revealed.
(3) Understand, understand. See "Yes".
暏
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　暏; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 498 No. 11
[Tang Yun] When the ancient cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Dong Wuqie, see the sound. [Said the text] Dan Ming also.　 [Ji Yun] Chang Shu cut, sound department. Shun or province as Wei.
暏
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Korean Ming Dynasty
暏
Name meaning
Nothing.
shǔ, dǔ
variant of 暑, summer heat; hot
